trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs 類別用來<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because it is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs> class, the ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class provides access to input parameters for validation and manipulation through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因為它衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>類別，ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs 類別提供存取輸入參數進行驗證，並透過<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class also provides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.ExecutingSelectCount%2A> property, which is used to check whether the currently executing data retrieval operation is retrieving a row count, in addition to the data.
trans-unit.target: ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs 類別也提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.ExecutingSelectCount%2A>屬性，可用來檢查資料列計數，除了資料時，是否要擷取目前正在執行資料擷取作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.ExecutingSelectCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is important because when data source paging is enabled, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting> event is raised twice.
trans-unit.target: 這很重要，因為當啟用資料來源分頁<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>引發兩次。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.ExecutingSelectCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.ExecutingSelectCount%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.ExecutingSelectCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its life cycle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制項不僅會公開許多您可以控制它們來使用基礎的商務物件在其生命週期中的不同時間的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的事件，以及相關聯<xref:System.EventArgs>類別和事件處理常式委派。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|`EventArgs`|`EventHandler`| |-----------|-----------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.
trans-unit.target: |事件 |`EventArgs`|`EventHandler`| |-----------|-----------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before the business object is instantiated.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.
trans-unit.target: 緊接在商務物件具現化之前發生。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately after the business object is instantiated.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: 商務物件具現化之後立即發生。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: 發生於之前擷取的資料。 |ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.
trans-unit.target: 發生之前插入、 更新或刪除作業會執行。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: 發生於之後擷取的資料。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.
trans-unit.target: 發生之後插入、 更新或刪除作業已完成。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a business object is destroyed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: 在商務物件被終結之前發生。 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The `inputParameters` parameter is an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: `inputParameters`參數是<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>符合中方法簽章和傳址方式傳遞的名稱/值組的集合。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> that specifies which additional data-related operations the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> should perform on a results set, such as sorting the data or returning a specific subset of data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref>指定哪些資料相關的其他作業<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>應該結果集，例如排序資料，或傳回特定資料子集上執行。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> is retrieving the number of rows of data, in addition to the data itself; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>已擷取的資料列的資料，除了資料本身; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Provides a mechanism that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> object can use to request data-related operations when data is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 提供一個機制， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref>物件可用來擷取資料時，要求資料相關作業。

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> class to request that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object perform additional data-related operations on a results set, such as sorting the data or returning a specific subset of data.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>類別來要求<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>物件執行的結果集，例如排序資料，或傳回特定資料子集上的其他資料相關作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: These data-related operations are enumerated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 這些資料相關作業列舉的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>列舉型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: The Arguments property is read-only, so you can examine, but not change, the arguments that are passed by the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 引數 屬性是唯讀的因此您可以檢查，但不是變更，資料繫結控制項所傳遞的引數。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> that specifies which additional data-related operations the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> should perform on a results set.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref>指定哪些資料相關的其他作業<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>應該執行的結果集。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> is retrieving a row count during a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>資料擷取作業期間擷取的資料列數。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object is performing data retrieval and data source paging is enabled, the data retrieval method is called twice: - Once to retrieve the set of data.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>物件正在執行資料擷取和資料來源已啟用分頁，資料擷取方法呼叫兩次:-一次擷取的資料集。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: - Once to retrieve a total row count.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取的總計資料列計數一次。

trans-unit.source: This raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting> event twice.
trans-unit.target: 這會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>事件兩次。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: For code that handles the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting> event, it might be important to determine the nature of the event (retrieving data or retrieving row count) so that any additional work that is performed by the handler is not unnecessarily duplicated for every data retrieval operation that is performed.
trans-unit.target: 處理的程式碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>事件，它可能是一定要瞭解事件 （擷取資料或擷取的資料列計數） 的本質，讓任何額外的工作執行的處理常式不會執行每個資料擷取作業的不必要地重複。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if data source paging is enabled and the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> is retrieving a row count; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用資料來源分頁和<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>正在擷取的資料列數，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
